amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $40 million appropriated for the advanced light water nuclear reactor research program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 25 in the Congressional Record of June 28, to reduce the appropriation for energy supply, research and development programs by $40 million. The intent of the amendment would be to eliminate funding for the advanced light water nuclear reactor research program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 487).
